# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #74](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#74)

#### ReaderAt2046

Is Soulcasting mass-conservative (Soulcast a 1kg goblet, you get 1 kg of blood.)?

#### Brandon Sanderson

In most circumstances, yes.
